Test Senaryosu Açıklaması: Geçerli kimlik bilgileri ile başarılı giriş
Test Adımları:
1. /user/login sayfasına git
2. Geçerli email adresini gir
3. Geçerli şifreyi gir
4. Giriş butonuna tıkla
Beklenen Sonuç: Kullanıcı başarıyla giriş yapmalı ve dashboard'a yönlendirilmeli

Test Senaryosu Açıklaması: Yanlış kimlik bilgileri ile başarısız giriş
Test Adımları:
1. /user/login sayfasına git
2. Yanlış email veya şifre gir
3. Giriş butonuna tıkla
Beklenen Sonuç: Hata mesajı gösterilmeli ve giriş başarısız olmalı

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /user/login
2. Leave email and password empty
3. Click Login button
Beklenen Sonuç: Validation errors should be shown for required fields

Test Adımları:
1. Login to system
2. Click user menu
3. Click logout
Beklenen Sonuç: User should be logged out and redirected to login page

Test Adımları:
1. Login to system
2. Navigate to /dashboard
Beklenen Sonuç: Dashboard should display email statistics and charts

Test Adımları:
1. Check total emails sent
2. Check open rates
3. Check reply rates
4. Verify with actual data
Beklenen Sonuç: Statistics should match actual campaign data

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /contacts
2. Check contact list display
Beklenen Sonuç: All contacts should be displayed in table format

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /contacts
2. Click Add Contact
3. Fill contact form
4. Save contact
Beklenen Sonuç: Contact should be added successfully with all fields
Test Verisi:
Name: John Doe
Email: john@test.com
Company: Test Corp

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /contacts
2. Select a contact
3. Click edit
4. Modify contact details
5. Save changes
Beklenen Sonuç: Contact details should be updated successfully

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /contacts
2. Select a contact
3. Click delete
4. Confirm deletion
Beklenen Sonuç: Contact should be removed from the list

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /contacts
2. Click Import Excel
3. Upload valid Excel file
4. Map columns
5. Import contacts
Beklenen Sonuç: All valid contacts from Excel should be imported successfully

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /contacts
2. Click Import Excel
3. Upload invalid Excel file
Beklenen Sonuç: Error message should be displayed for invalid format
Test Verisi: Invalid Excel file or unsupported format

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /contacts
2. Select contacts or all
3. Click export
Beklenen Sonuç: Excel file should be downloaded with selected contacts

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /contacts
2. Enter name in search box
3. Press enter or search button
Beklenen Sonuç: Filtered results should show matching contacts

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /contacts
2. Enter email in search boxss
3. Press enter or search button
Beklenen Sonuç: Filtered results should show matching contacts

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /contacts
2. Check if pagination exists for large lists
3. Navigate between pages
Beklenen Sonuç: Pagination should work correctly and show appropriate contacts

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /templates
2. Check template list
Beklenen Sonuç: All created templates should be displayed in list format

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /templates
2. Click Create Template
3. Fill template form (name, subject, content)
4. Save template
Beklenen Sonuç: Template should be created and appear in template list
Test Verisi:
Name: Welcome Template
Subject: Welcome to CERILAS
Content: HTML/Text content

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /templates
2. Select template
3. Click edit
4. Modify template
5. Save changes
Beklenen Sonuç: Template should be updated successfully

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /templates
2. Select template
3. Click delete
4. Confirm deletion
Beklenen Sonuç: Template should be removed from list

Test Adımları:
1. Create/edit template
2. Add variables like {{name}}, {{company}}
3. Save template
4. Use in campaign
Beklenen Sonuç: Variables should be properly replaced in sent emails

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /templates
2. Select template
3. Click preview
Beklenen Sonuç: Template should be displayed as it would appear in email

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /campaigns
2. Check campaign list display
Beklenen Sonuç: All campaigns should be displayed with status and statistics

Test Senaryosu Açıklaması: Create new campaign with single template
Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /campaigns/create
2. Fill campaign details
3. Select template
4. Select contacts
5. Set schedule
6. Save campaign
Beklenen Sonuç: Campaign should be created successfully
Test Verisi:
Name: Test Campaign
Template: Existing template
Contacts: Selected contacts
Schedule: Future date/time

Test Senaryosu Açıklaması: Create sequence campaign with multiple templates
Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /campaigns/create
2. Enable sequence mode
3. Add multiple templates with delays
4. Select contacts
5. Set schedule
6. Save campaign
Beklenen Sonuç: Sequence campaign should be created with proper template order

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /campaigns
2. Select draft campaign
3. Click edit
4. Modify campaign details
5. Save changes
Beklenen Sonuç: Draft campaign should be updated successfully

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /campaigns
2. Select campaign
3. Change status (Draft/Active/Paused)
4. Save changes
Beklenen Sonuç: Campaign status should be updated and affect sending behavior

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /campaigns
2. Select campaign
3. Click delete
4. Confirm deletion
Beklenen Sonuç: Campaign should be removed from list

Test Adımları:
1. Create/edit campaign
2. Click Send Test Email
3. Enter test email address
4. Send test
Beklenen Sonuç: Test email should be received at specified address

Test Adımları:
1. Create campaign
2. Set future date/time for sending
3. Set status to Active
4. Save campaign
Beklenen Sonuç: Campaign should be scheduled and start sending at specified time

Test Adımları:
1. Create campaign with 'Stop on Reply' enabled
2. Start campaign
3. Reply to one of the emails
4. Check if further emails stop for that contact
Beklenen Sonuç: No more emails should be sent to contacts who replied

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /campaigns
2. Select sent campaign
3. View analytics/statistics
Beklenen Sonuç: Should show sent count, open rate, reply rate, etc.

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /company-info
2. Check displayed information
Beklenen Sonuç: Company details should be properly displayed

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /company-info
2. Click edit
3. Modify company details
4. Save changes
Beklenen Sonuç: Company information should be updated successfully

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /company-info
2. Configure SMTP settings
3. Test SMTP connection
4. Save settings
Beklenen Sonuç: SMTP settings should be saved and emails should send properly

Test Adımları:
1. Click Scheduler Logs link in footer
2. Check log display
Beklenen Sonuç: Scheduler logs should be displayed with email sending history

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to /scheduler-logs
2. Apply date filters
3. Apply status filters
4. Check results
Beklenen Sonuç: Logs should be filtered according to applied criteria

Test Adımları:
1. Send campaign email
2. Open email in recipient inbox
3. Check tracking in dashboard
Beklenen Sonuç: Email open should be tracked and displayed in analytics

Test Adımları:
1. Send campaign email  
2. Reply to the email
3. Check reply tracking
Beklenen Sonuç: Email reply should be tracked and campaign should stop if configured

Test Adımları:
1. Login to system
2. Click each menu item
3. Verify page loads correctly
Beklenen Sonuç: All menu items should navigate to correct pages without errors

Test Adımları:
1. Navigate to sub-pages
2. Check breadcrumb display
3. Click breadcrumb links
Beklenen Sonuç: Breadcrumbs should show correct path and navigate properly

Test Adımları:
1. Access platform on desktop
2. Access on tablet
3. Access on mobile
4. Check layout adaptation
Beklenen Sonuç: Platform should be responsive and functional on all devices

Test Adımları:
1. Perform actions that require loading
2. Check loading indicators
3. Verify completion states
Beklenen Sonuç: Loading indicators should appear and disappear appropriately

Test Adımları:
1. Trigger various errors (network, validation)
2. Check error message display
3. Verify error recovery
Beklenen Sonuç: Error messages should be clear and helpful

Test Adımları:
1. Clear browser cache
2. Navigate to each page
3. Measure load times
Beklenen Sonuç: Pages should load within acceptable time limits (< 3 seconds)

Test Adımları:
1. Import large number of contacts (1000+)
2. Test list performance
3. Test campaign creation with many contacts
Beklenen Sonuç: System should handle large data sets without performance issues

Test Adımları:
1. Try SQL injection in forms
2. Try XSS attacks
3. Test with special characters
4. Test with extremely long inputs
Beklenen Sonuç: System should properly validate and sanitize all inputs

Test Adımları:
1. Login to system
2. Leave idle for extended period
3. Try to perform actions
Beklenen Sonuç: Session should timeout and require re-authentication

Test Adımları:
1. Create campaign
2. Send to real email addresses
3. Check delivery in recipient inboxes
4. Verify tracking works
Beklenen Sonuç: Emails should be delivered successfully and tracking should work

Test Adımları:
1. Perform various operations
2. Check database records
3. Verify data integrity
Beklenen Sonuç: All operations should maintain data consistency in database
